attributes.additional_details: I and thousands of other people are frustrated and angry since this happened to other local GP surgeries that created Partnerships with others, now they can't call to their doctor to get appointments because of horrendous queues on the phone when they call and then get cut off. So many reviews I have seen before and again yesterday. People said the system has seriously declined since this happened. Someone in Government needs to look at GP practice reviews.
attributes.background: Stop GP practitioners from joining with other surgeries.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions relating to GP surgeries, including whether to join with other surgeries, are operational matters for individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Commission an independent review into GP access: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598947
